title: As a developer I would like to add the ability to clone a production user in a non production environment
custom_steps:
On the user accounts page in a non production environment once a user is loaded there should be an option to clone an existing production user.  

The list of production users should be within the same org as the loaded user

Cloning will remove and store all permission for the existing user and replace them with the ones associated with the prod user.

title: As a developer I would like to revert a cloned production user in a non production environment back to the user's original permissions
custom_steps:
On the user accounts page in a non production environment once a previously cloned user is loaded there should be:
An indicator that the user is cloned and to which production account they are cloned.  
An option to revert the user back to their original permissions.

title: Two Way Player Utility: PERMISSIONS
custom_steps:
Utility will not be editable by Club Users

**New Groups:**
ebis-widget-twowayplayer-editors
ebis-widget-twowayplayer-viewers

**Role Assignments:**

**BOC:**
ebis-proplayer-boc-admin-role 
 - ebis-widget-twowayplayer-editors

ebis-proplayer-boc-viewer-role 
 - ebis-widget-twowayplayer-viewers

**Club:**
ebis-proplayer-club-admin-role 
 - ebis-widget-twowayplayer-viewers

ebis-proplayer-club-viewer-role 
 - ebis-widget-twowayplayer-viewers

title: As a User, I want to see a Two-Way Player tab on the Rosters Dashboard
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on ROSTER Dashboard
custom_steps: WHEN club user navigates to tabs on Roster Dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN user will be able to view the TWO-WAY PLAYER tab
AND "TWO-WAY PLAYER TAB" will appear after 'SPECIAL ROSTERS' tab

title: As a User, I want to see the Two-Way Player widget on the Two-Way Player
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on ROSTERS dashboard
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=two-way_players_-_boc
https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=two-way_players_-_club

Data Discovery:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/19238264/Data+Discovery+-+Two-Way+Player+Widget

WHEN user clicks on 'TWO-WAY PLAYER' tab
custom_expected:
THEN user will see 'TWO-WAY PLAYER' widget
AND  widget will match provided wire and data discovery

title: As a BOC User, I want to set positions for the players on my Two-Way Player widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC USER
AND user has navigated to Two-Way Player widget
custom_steps:
Wire: https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=two-way_players_-_boc

Data Discovery:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/19238264/Data+Discovery+-+Two-Way+Player+Widget

WHEN user clicks on "PENCIL ICON" on each player's row
AND
WHEN user clicks on "SAVE" button
OR   user clicks on "CANCEL" button
custom_expected:
THEN player's row will enter into 'EDIT MODE' 
AND POS can be selected from Dropdown in "POS" column
-- 
THEN If "Saved" is clicked, changes are committed and all rows are returned to view mode
       -- If canceled, changes are dismissed and all rows are returned to view mode

title: As a User, I want to see a pitcher stats on my Two-Way Player widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has navigated to TWO-WAY PLAYERS widget (ROSTERS dashboard)
custom_steps:
Wire: https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=two-way_players_-_boc

Data Discovery:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/19238264/Data+Discovery+-+Two-Way+Player+Widget

WHEN user is viewing Innings Pitched column in Two Way Player widget
custom_expected:
THEN "INNINGS PITCHED" column will display count for Innings Pitched for current year
-- IF player has not pitched any inning, the column will be blank
-- IF player has pitched any innings, "INNINGS PITCHED" column will display data in format (i.e. 30.1 or 35.2)

title: As a User, I want to see position player's stats on my Two-Way Player widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on 'TWO WAY PLAYER' widget
custom_steps:
Wire: https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=two-way_players_-_boc


WHEN user is viewing Two Way Player widget
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a "Starts as POS Player" column

AND column will display stats, for current year as: 
-Games started as a position player or designated hitter (with at least three plate appearances in each of those games)
 - If the player has not started any games that meet the definition, the column will be blank

title: As a User, I want to see a when a player is approaching the Two-Way Player threshold on the Two-Way Player widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN  User is viewing the Two-Way Player widget
custom_steps:
Wire: https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=two-way_players_-_boc

Data Discovery: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/19238264/Data+Discovery+-+Two-Way+Player+Widget

WHEN User is viewing Two Way Player widget to see what players are approaching TWP threshold
custom_expected:
THEN   Player will be considered 'Approaching' when player reaches 15 IP or 15 GS*
AND    If a player reaches 15 IP or 15 GS*, his stats will change color (depicted in the wire)

title: As a User, I want to see a when a player is crosses the Two-Way Player threshold on the Two-Way Player widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN the User is viewing the Two-Way Player widget
custom_steps:
WHEN the User is searching the Two-Way Player widget for players that crossed the Two Way Player threshold

Wire: https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=two-way_players_-_boc

Data Discovery: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/19238264/Data+Discovery+-+Two-Way+Player+Widget
custom_expected:
THEN The Two-Way Player threshold will be considered 20 IP or 20 GS*
AND  If a player reaches 20 IP or 20 GS*, his stats will change color (depicted in the wire)
AND  When a player reaches 20 IP & 20 GS*, a clipboard notification will be generated for both the player's club and the BOC

title: As a BOC User, I want to designate a player as a Two-Way Player on the Two-Way Player widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC user
AND   is viewing the Two Way Player widget
AND   is viewing a player who is an eligible Two-Way Player
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC USER navigates to "Designate Two-Way Player" column in Two-Way Player Utility 

Wire: https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=two-way_players_-_boc

Data Discovery:  https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/19238264/Data+Discovery+-+Two-Way+Player+Widget

 -  a checkbox will appear in the "Designate Two-Way Player" column as depicted in the wire
 - When the row is in edit mode, the checkbox will be available to check
custom_expected:
THEN   "Eligible" will appear in view mode for player who is eligible for Two-Way Player status
AND     when row is in edit mode, the checkbox will be available to check
AND     when checkbox is checked, TWP POS dropdown is enabled 
AND     can select TWP POS
AND     when a row is in edit mode, there will be Save and Cancel all changes buttons
         -- If Save is clicked, changes are committed and all rows are returned to view mode
         -- If Cancel is clicked, changes are dismissed and all rows are returned to view mode

title: As a BOC User, I want to set a players second position on the Two-Way Player widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC user
AND   is viewing the Two Way Player widget
AND   is viewing a player who is an eligible Two-Way Player
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC USER navigates to "Designate Two-Way Player" column in Two-Way Player Utility 

Wire: https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=two-way_players_-_boc

Data Discovery:  https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/19238264/Data+Discovery+-+Two-Way+Player+Widget
custom_expected:
THEN   "Eligible" will appear in view mode for player who is eligible for Two-Way Player status
AND     when row is in edit mode, the checkbox will be available to check
AND     when checkbox is checked, TWP POS dropdown is enabled 
AND     can select TWP POS
AND     when a row is in edit mode, there will be Save and Cancel all changes buttons
         -- If Save is clicked, changes are committed and all rows are returned to view mode
         -- If Cancel is clicked, changes are dismissed and all rows are returned to view mode

title: As User, I want to see a Two-Way Players Displayed as TWP
custom_steps:
Wire: https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=two-way_players_-_boc

Data Discovery:  https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/19238264/Data+Discovery+-+Two-Way+Player+Widget

AC:
 - When a player is designated as a Two-Way Player, their position will be displayed as TWP, throughout the UI
 - This includes, but is not limited to:
  -- the fixed header on their profile
  -- widgets
  -- transactions
  -- contracts
 - TWP should not appear in any position dropdown
